TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MatrixConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public NotInheritable Class MatrixConverter Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class MatrixConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts instances of other types to and from a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixConverter> to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> from an attribute string; use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Converters.MatrixValueSerializer> to create a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure.
## Examples The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixConverter> to convert a string into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>.
[!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixConverterExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixconverterexample_csharp)]
